author: georgiadiebelius1
title: Ryanair selling flights for ÂŁ3 – but you have to book now
text:
Go, go, go! (Picture:Â Chris Ratcliffe/Bloomberg via Getty Images) If youâ€™ve got some holiday to use up and fancy going awayÂ on the cheap (and we mean cheap), thenÂ get out your wallet. 
Ryanair has launched a massive sale, with hundreds of seats at prices less than a scratchcard.
Teenage girl assaulted on train 'simply because she was deaf' For just ÂŁ2.99,Â the low-cost airline is flogging tickets to Oslo, Bordeaux and Brittany.
The offer does just apply to specific dates, but if youÂ can get the time off work then its available to you today.
However, spaces are limited… so act fast.
Jet away on holiday (Picture:Â Dan Kitwood/Getty Images) Flying from London Stansted, travellers can jet over to Bordeaux in France for just ÂŁ2.99 on April 4.
And if you fancy going in may, you still can – for ÂŁ4.99.
Rape victim defends judge's comments warning women against drunken behaviour Those free on April 5 can fly to the likes of Brive in France, or Oslo Torp in Norway.
And, yes, you guessed it – it won’t cost you more than ÂŁ3.
Dinard in the French seaside is also offering trips with flight options for under ÂŁ3.
Those willing to slash out a little more (ÂŁ7.99) can visitÂ Toulouse and Strasbourg in France, as well as Basel in Switzerland.
Result.
